skill.s1.name: Summer Cooling Magic
skill.s1.description: Deals [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} ATK Bless DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies.

If Closer is in [color=#a6cd51][b][Midsummer][/b][/color], consumes [color=#ffffa4][b]10% Max HP[/b][/color] to deal an additional hit of [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} ATK Bless DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies.
skill.s2.name: Leisure Holiday
skill.s2.description: Deals [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} ATK Bless DMG[/b][/color] to 1 enemy and restores [color=#ffffa4][b]20% Max HP[/b][/color].
If Closer is in [color=#a6cd51][b][Midsummer][/b][/color], deals an additional hit of [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} ATK Bless DMG[/b][/color] to the target.
skill.s3.name: Wave Chaser
skill.s3.description: Immediately enters [color=#a6cd51][b][Midsummer][/b][/color] until the end of next turn.
Consumes [color=#ffffa4][b]15% Max HP[/b][/color] and deals [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} ATK Bless DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies.

When Closer is in [color=#a6cd51][b][Midsummer][/b][/color], increases own [color=#ffffa4][b]CRIT Rate[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] and damage by [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
skill.hl.name: HIGHLIGHT
skill.hl.description: Deals [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data} ATK Bless DMG[/b][/color] to all enemies and restores [color=#ffffa4][b]20% Max HP[/b][/color].
Increase [color=#ffffa4][b]HIGHLIGHT DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]25%[/b][/color] if Closer's [color=#ffffa4][b]HP[/b][/color] are above [color=#ffffa4][b]50%[/b][/color].
skill.p1.name: Shaded
skill.p1.description: Increase [color=#ffffa4][b]DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color] when overhealed for 2 turns.
skill.p2.name: Heat Wave
skill.p2.description: When [color=#ffffa4][b]Max HP[/b][/color] is over [color=#ffffa4][b]8000[/b][/color] in battle, for every [color=#ffffa4][b]100 Max HP[/b][/color] over the cap, increase [color=#ffffa4][b]ATK[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]24[/b][/color], up to [color=#ffffa4][b]{skill_data}[/b][/color].
awareness.a0.name: Sunshine and Blue Sea
awareness.a0.description: When healed, decreases the cooldown of [ref=s3][color=#2d9de1][b][u][Wave Chaser][/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 1 turn if the healing amount exceeds [color=#ffffa4][b]15% Max HP[/b][/color], up to a minimum of 1 turn.
Closer will not faint when consuming [color=#ffffa4][b]HP[/b][/color] from skills.
awareness.a1.name: Waves Kissing
awareness.a1.description: [color=#a6cd51][b][Midsummer][/b][/color] additionally increases Closer's [color=#ffffa4][b]CRIT Rate[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]10%[/b][/color] and [color=#ffffa4][b]CRIT DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]25%[/b][/color].
Permanently decreases the cooldown of [ref=s3][color=#2d9de1][b][u][Wave Chaser][/u][/b][/color][/ref] by 1 turn.
awareness.a2.name: Scattered Golden Radiance
awareness.a2.description: [ref=s2][color=#2d9de1][b][u][Leisure Holiday][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#ffffa4][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of[color=#ffffa4][b] Lv. 15[/b][/color].
[ref=s3][color=#2d9de1][b][u][Wave Chaser][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#ffffa4][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#ffffa4][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a3.name: Faraway Sailboat Sway
awareness.a3.description: When healed, increases [color=#ffffa4][b]CRIT DMG[/b][/color] by [color=#ffffa4][b]20%[/b][/color] for 2 turns, up to 2 stacks.
awareness.a4.name: Salty Fragrance of Sea Breeze
awareness.a4.description: [ref=s1][color=#2d9de1][b][u][Summer Cooling Magic][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#ffffa4][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#ffffa4][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
[ref=hl][color=#2d9de1][b][u][Combat Skills][/u][/b][/color][/ref] [color=#ffffa4][b]Lv. +3[/b][/color], up to a maximum of [color=#ffffa4][b]Lv. 15[/b][/color].
awareness.a5.name: Sunshine Smile
awareness.a5.description: [ref=hl][color=#2d9de1][b][u][HIGHLIGHT][/u][/b][/color][/ref] Effect Boost: Increases the [color=#ffffa4][b]DMG[/b][/color] of Closer's next [ref=s3][color=#2d9de1][b][u][Wave Chaser][/u][/b][/color][/ref] by [color=#ffffa4][b]80%[/b][/color].
awareness.a6.name: Hand-Holding Summer Stroll
awareness.a6.description: When Closer is in [color=#fec02b][b][True Summer][/b][/color], [ref=s1][color=#2d9de1][b][u][Summer Cooling Magic][/u][/b][/color][/ref] now triggers the additional damage 3 times.
[ref=s2][color=#2d9de1][b][u][Leisure Holiday][/u][/b][/color][/ref] now restores an additional [color=#ffffa4][b]20% Max HP[/b][/color].
Increases the skill multiplier of [ref=s3][color=#2d9de1][b][u][Wave Chaser][/u][/b][/color][/ref] by [color=#ffffa4][b]50%[/b][/color].
